text: Agle din subah-sawere Yahūdāh kī fauj Taqua ke Registān ke lie rawānā huī. Nikalte waqt Yahūsafat ne un ke sāmne khaṛe ho kar kahā, “Yahūdāh aur Yarūshalam ke mardo, merī bāt suneṅ! Rab apne Ḳhudā par bharosā rakheṅ to āp qāym raheṅge. Us ke nabiyoṅ kī bātoṅ kā yaqīn kareṅ to āp ko kāmyābī hāsil hogī.”
